title: Space Marine 2 extended gameplay trailer showcases huge environments and hordes of enemies, but somehow it's not as violent as I expected
description: Here's nine minutes of Lieutenant Titus killing everything he sees.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's movie trailer finally introduces the gang: Freddy, Foxy, Bonnie, Chica, and Mr Cupcake, who eats a guy's face
description: Sometimes bad things happen to bad people, too.

title: We scientifically ranked Baldur's Gate 3's party members on hotness, toughness, and meme-ability
description: An objectively correct PC Gamer team ranking of all ten Baldur's Gate 3's companions.

title: Palia's first seasonal event adds exactly the kind of communal minigame I was hoping for
description: The nightly Maji Market is a good initial take on a typical MMO season event.

title: Bethesda commissioned an official Starfield song from Imagine Dragons and if you guessed that it rhymes 'high' with 'sky,' you are correct
description: It's not the worst thing I've ever heard, but it is kind of baffling.

title: Call of Duty enlists AI to eavesdrop on voice chat and help ban toxic players starting today
description: There's a new AI-powered sheriff in town, and its name is ToxMod.

title: Dwight from the Office advertising Armored Core 6 is the future mech fans dreamed of
description: All that Elden Ring money gets your next game a higher calibre of marketing.

title: Google begins trialling tool that adds a watermark to AI-generated images
description: SynthID is not "foolproof against extreme image manipulation, but it does provide a promising technical approach".

title: ChatGPT maker OpenAI acquires open-source Minecraft clone which I found out about from an article written by ChatGPT
description: This article was not written by AI. Pinky promise.

title: Life By You looks like The Sims with its brakes cut, and if it doesn't shake apart it could be something very special
description: They can call the sequel Second Life By You.

title: Asus ROG Raikiri Pro review
description: A controller best experienced from afar.

title: Oops they did it again: War Thunder player posts NATO restricted military manual for what feels like the hundredth time
description: Well, they do say military life is all about routine.

title: The Elder Scrolls 6 is out of 'pre-production' but Pete Hines says it will be 'years' before we start hearing about it
description: Hines said Bethesda is focused on Starfield and that's where its attention is going to stay for a long while to come.

title: One terrifying Baldur's Gate 3 player has crafted a 'darkest timeline' playthrough which gives everyone the worst ending—except the puppy
description: The true face of Chaotic Evil.

title: AMD regains (a tiny bit) of GPU market share from Nvidia
description: But graphics card sales are still in the toilet compared to a year ago.

title: Turns out the best way to play Baldur's Gate 3 is as a terrible Paladin that wants to murder his own party
description: Combining D&D's most devout class with the Dark Urge origin creates a wonderfully conflicted adventure.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 will soon let you ditch your friend's abandoned co-op character
description: Stop your pals from overstaying their welcome.

title: No ammo, 40 seconds, all fury—series vet earns the title 'The Fireworks of Shibuya' at an Armored Core 6 preview event when he punches an airship out of the sky
description: Zero experience with the game didn't stop this player from making FromSoftware history.

title: DPVR E4 review
description: Another solid PCVR headset enters the fray.

title: Cities: Skylines 2 is getting the science of hailstorms all wrong
description: My icy heart calls for more scientific accuracy!

title: How to complete Metamorphosis Attunement in Destiny 2
description: Activate Hive runes and attune your element as part of the Bladed Path quest.

title: Everything you need to know about AMD's FSR 3 upscaling and Fluid Motion Frames technology
description: Taking the fight to Nvidia's DLSS 3 with Frame Generation at last.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 player one-shots Act 2's final boss by smuggling 15,000 gold into his pocket
description: Beat the rich.

title: Cable-free GPU power connector could deliver up to 900W and have a longer lifespan than 12VHPWR
description: Looks to be the better connector for powerful gaming GPUs.

title: A Baldur's Gate 3 bug is cutting off 1,500 lines of evil companion content, but the next patch will bring them back
description: Minthara is about to come out of her shell.

description: The seller claims that money from the sale will go to charity.

description: The deadliest foe in Remnant 2 is a wonky platform.

title: Cooling gel ear pads are the cheap gaming headset upgrade I never knew I needed
description: Here's how a simple ear pad replacement made my gaming headphones infinitely better.

title: How to get the Moonlight Sword in Armored Core 6
description: Track down FromSoft's famous blade on Rubicon.

title: Obsidian's RPG design expert reckons he knows why no one's maining Cleric in Baldur's Gate 3, and it's the same reason no one plays them in his games either
